channel.title: Ryan Griego's blog
channel.description: I went from being a graphic design major to a software engineer. Welcome to my blog!

item.title: Building an Automated Job Application Follow-Up System With Python and the Raspberry Pi
item.description: How I developed an automated system using Python and a Raspberry Pi to send personalized follow-up emails to hiring contacts, improving the job application process while enhancing my skill in automation.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)

item.title: Building The Price is Right: An Autonomous AI Deal Discovery System
item.description: A hands-on look at fine-tuning open source AI models using LoRA/QLoRA techniques on Amazon product data. I discovered how a fine-tuned 8B parameter model outperformed GPT-4o and Claude, while navigating the practical challenges of limited GPU resources and hyperparameter optimization.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)

item.title: Building My First RAG Application: A Dive into AI-Powered Student Enrollment
item.description: I built my first Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system - a student enrollment chatbot that demonstrates how AI can improve how educational institutions serve prospective students. The system combines natural language processing with a knowledge base to provide instant, accurate responses to student inquiries.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)

item.title: Fine-Tuning Open Source Models: From the Trenches
item.description: A hands-on look at fine-tuning open source AI models using LoRA/QLoRA techniques on Amazon product data. I discovered how a fine-tuned 8B parameter model outperformed GPT-4o and Claude, while navigating the practical challenges of limited GPU resources and hyperparameter optimization.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)
